source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000010_MAXIMA<tab>They're here, Commander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000010_MAXIMA<tab>Они здесь, командир.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000020_RAUBAHN<tab>And I for one am grateful that they are. I'm told you've been busy since our paths last crossed at the Ghimlyt Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000020_RAUBAHN<tab>И за это я благодарен как никто другой. Как мне сказали, вы были здорово заняты после нашего расставания во Тьме Гимлита.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Not that I understand half of it. When the Scions spoke of other worlds, I'd struggle to describe what I pictured.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Почти ни черта из рассказа не понял. Когда Хранители говорят о других мирах, воображение меня подводит.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>Mayhap things would seem clearer were I to hear the tale from your own lips, but I'm afraid the situation will not afford us that luxury.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>Может, дело немного прояснилось бы, услышь я историю из твоих уст, однако, боюсь, нынешняя ситуация не предоставит нам роскоши поговорить за пинтой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000050_RAUBAHN<tab>I trust you two require no introduction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000050_RAUBAHN<tab>Полагаю, вас друг другу представлять не нужно.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000060_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We meet again, hero of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000060_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Вот и свиделись, <var 08 E905 ((героиня)) ((герой)) /var> Эорзии.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000070_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Must we repeat this ridiculous display? I pose no threat to you─though what I come to warn you of very well might.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000070_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Что, опять клинки наголо? Я не представляю никакой угрозы - в отличии от того, о чём я прибыл рассказать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000080_RAUBAHN<tab>Had he meant to do us harm, I hazard he would have kept to the shadows─and brought more than two companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000080_RAUBAHN<tab>Если бы даже он замышлял недоброе, полагаю, действовал бы из теней - а ещё привёл бы поболе, чем двоих компаньонов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000090_RAUBAHN<tab>We need not pretend to be the best of friends, but I hope we can put aside our differences for the present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000090_RAUBAHN<tab>Нам не нужно притворяться, будто мы лучшие друзья, но на время было бы неплохо отложить неприязнь в сторону.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>As you are doubtless aware, Ser Estinien and I cooperated to rid the world of Black Rose in your absence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Как тебе уже, без сомнения, известно, мы с сэром Эстиниеном скооперировались, дабы в твоё отсутствие избавить мир от Чёрной Розы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Our journey together took us as far as the imperial palace, where we witnessed Emperor Varis meet his death at Zenos's hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Наше с ним совместное путешествие в итоге привело в имперский дворец, где мы увидели, как Император Вар принимает смерть от руки Зеноса.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Being the sole witnesses to this crime, and in no position to defend our innocence, we were then forced to flee, each pursuing his own avenue of escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Мы были единственными свидетелями произошедшего, и у нас не было бы возможности доказать нашу невиновность, а потому мы были вынуждены бежать - каждый своей дорогой, впрочем.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>When we were later reunited, Estinien claimed to have encountered an unfamiliar kind of machina during his flight. But to me, his description seemed anything but. And upon further investigation, I found that I was right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Позже мы снова встретились, и Эстиниен заявил, что во время побега в бою столкнулся с доселе невиданной техникой. Чем детальнее он описывал машину, тем больше становились мои подозрения. Совсем скоро я убедился, что они были верны.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Empire is developing a new Ultima Weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Империя создаёт новое Абсолютное Оружие.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000150_KRILE<tab>What? That Allagan monstrosity? Created to vanquish primals? ...With which you yourself once thought to conquer Eorzea?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000150_KRILE<tab>Что? Речь о том аллаганском чудовище, созданном, чтобы уничтожать праймалов?
...С которым вы однажды заявились покорять Эорзию?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The same. In my foolishness, I sought to harness its power─and became the Ascians' pawn in so doing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Именно. Я был дураком, полагая, что мощь Оружия принадлежит мне - стал не больше чем послушной марионеткой асцианца.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000161_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But you know as well as I how that tale ended.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000161_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Всем прекрасно известно, как закончилась та история.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Weapon itself, excavated from beneath this very city, was destroyed ere we could fully unravel its secrets. And that should have been the end of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Само Оружие - извлечённое, кстати говоря, из недр под этим самым городом - было уничтожено до того, как мы сумели его полностью изучить. Проекту настал конец... по крайней мере, должен был.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But, unlikely as it sounds, the Empire's efforts to recreate it have somehow borne fruit─primarily through secret research conducted by the VIIth Imperial Legion, it would seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Увы, хотя это звучит невероятно, Империи каким-то образом удалось воссоздать его. В основном благодаря разведданным, добытым, надо думать, ещё Седьмым имперским легионом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000190_KRILE<tab>Wait. The VIIth was all but annihilated at Carteneau─along with its legatus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000190_KRILE<tab>Стойте. Но ведь Седьмой был уничтожен на Картено - вместе с их легатом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Indeed, few survived. The VIIth as it is now has little in common with the legion led by van Darnus, and its leadership has changed hands several times since.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>О нет, некоторые выжили. Конечно, Седьмой легион сейчас является тенью былого себя во времена командования ван Дарна, да и само руководство с тех пор несколько раз сменялось.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Precisely how this project has continued despite such turmoil, and under whose auspices, remains a mystery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Как, вообще, проект выжил, невзирая на всё произошедшее, и под чьим руководством велась работа, остаётся загадкой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>What we do know, however, is that a number of prototypes have been produced...and that one of them is on its way to Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Наверняка мы знаем лишь то, что было произведено несколько прототипов... и что один из них направили в Эорзию.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We attempted to stop it, but it was all we could do to slow its progress. So we resolved instead to bring you warning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Мы предприняли попытку сорвать поставку, но смогли лишь замедлить процесс. Вместо этого мы решили вас предупредить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000240_MAXIMA<tab>And right glad are we that you did─though it soundly dashed our hopes that tensions might ease at last...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000240_MAXIMA<tab>И мы весьма рады, что вы это сделали - пускай новости и перечёркивают наши зародившиеся было надежды на мир и покой...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000250_RAUBAHN<tab>As it is, we've begun to strengthen our presence in the Ghimlyt Dark, and are assembling a force to meet the coming threat. A force with you in its vanguard, I hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000250_RAUBAHN<tab>Короче говоря, с этого момента мы начнём укреплять наши силы во Мраке Гимлита, чтобы быть готовыми встретить угрозу. С тобой в авангарде, хотелось бы надеяться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Before you say anything, I know full well you have pressing concerns of your own. Your comrades remain in peril, and I would not ask you to forsake them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Но, прежде чем ты ответишь... знаю, у тебя и своих дел по горло. Твои товарищи в серьёзной беде, и я не прошу бросать их.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000270_RAUBAHN<tab>But the fact remains that you and you alone have faced the Ultima Weapon and emerged victorious. We need you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000270_RAUBAHN<tab>Но факт остаётся фактом - <var 08 E905 ((тебе единственной)) ((тебе единственному)) /var> удалось выстоять в битве против Абсолютного Оружия. Ты <var 08 E905 ((нужна)) ((нужен)) /var> нам.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>And so, when the time comes─<var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> your comrades can spare you─I bid you lend us your strength. I've assigned an officer to await your word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>А потому, когда время придёт - <var 1A 02 /var>если<var 1A 01 /var> твои товарищи подарят тебе свободную минутку - прошу, помоги и нам. Я назначил офицера, который будет ждать от тебя вестей.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Ascians' downfall was to be the work of my remaining days...but it was my hand that kindled these flames, and I cannot allow them to spread any further.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Уничтожать асцианцев - вот чем я собирался заниматься в остаток отведённых мне дней... Но этот пожар был начат моей рукой, и я не позволю огню распространиться.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>I will do what I must to see this mistake consigned to history once and for all...even if it means begging your aid. The fates will enjoy the irony, even as I endure the ignominy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Я сделаю всё, что в моих силах, дабы стереть свою ошибку со страниц истории... даже если придётся умолять тебя о помощи. Судьба не лишена иронии, а я давно смирился со своим позором.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000310_MAXIMA<tab>I too shall make for the border and offer my skills, meager though they seem in such company. Mayhap we shall meet there anon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000310_MAXIMA<tab>Я тоже собираюсь на границу, предложу свои умения... пускай они и относятся ко мне с подозрением. Надеюсь, мы скоро снова увидимся.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000320_KRILE<tab>Though we can ill afford to ignore the coming of a new Ultima Weapon, our friends' plight grows ever more precarious, and none save you can join them in the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000320_KRILE<tab>Мы не можем себе позволить закрыть глаза на новое Абсолютное Оружие, но проблемы наших друзей обладают гораздо большей срочностью, и никто, кроме тебя, не способен путешествовать на Первый.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000330_KRILE<tab>I only hope you are not forced to make a choice...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000330_KRILE<tab>Надеюсь лишь, ты сможешь совладать со столь непростым выбором...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now that we're all here─what news from the Source?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Итак. Теперь, когда все в сборе — какие новости с Источника?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now that we're all here─what news from the Source?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Итак. Теперь, когда все в сборе — какие новости с Источника?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>A new <var 1A 02 /var>Ultima Weapon<var 1A 01 /var>...? We must count ourselves lucky that Gaius has pledged his assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Новое Абсолютное Оружие?.. Гляжу, нам здорово повезло, что Гай на нашей стороне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>While this is indeed a worrying development, I think the state of the Empire as a whole greater grounds for concern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>В самом деле, ситуация серьёзная, но ещё больше меня беспокоит нынешнее положение дел в Империи.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>With the Emperor slain and Zenos returned, it is impossible to predict how matters will unfold in Garlemald. The Ultima Weapon may be but the first of many unpleasant surprises.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>Теперь, когда Император убит, а Зенос вернулся, невозможно предполагать, что станет дальше с Гарлемалдом. Абсолютное Оружие может стать лишь первым из множества неприятных сюрпризов.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000390_URIANGER<tab>The situation beareth closer observation, of that there is no doubt─and doth compound our need to return unto the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000390_URIANGER<tab>Положенье требует более детального рассмотрения, сомнений нет — и сие лишь усугубляет необходимость нашу вскорости вернуться на Источник.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then let us address that issue. Our long search for a means to see you safely home may well be nearing its conclusion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Тогда вернёмся к этой теме. Наше длительное исследование в поисках способа вернуть вас домой, вероятно, вскоре будет окончено.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thanks in large part to Urianger and Beq Lugg's invaluable insight, we have succeeded in fashioning a vessel for the journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Благодаря бесценным советам от Урианже и Бек Лугг, мы сумели создать сосуд для подобного путешествия.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000420_BEQLUGG<tab>We set out to create a crystalline container retaining the more useful properties of white auracite, but without its regrettable limitations. And after a good deal of trial and error, we made one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000420_BEQLUGG<tab>Мы пытались изготовить кристальный контейнер, сохраняющий свойства белого аурацита, но притом не обладающий его недостатками. И после серии проб и ошибок, наконец, мы сделали такой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000430_BEQLUGG<tab>An ark for soul and mind both, that will allow your incorporeal self in its entirety to be ferried between worlds... A “spirit vessel,” if you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000430_BEQLUGG<tab>Ковчег как для души, так и для сознания — он позволит вам, бесплотным, пересечь вечную пустоту между мирами... «Сосуд души», если позволите.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000440_BEQLUGG<tab>However...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000440_BEQLUGG<tab>Однако...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>However?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Однако?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000460_URIANGER<tab>Though the vessel is possessed of the requisite qualities to hold mind and memory, it wanteth yet for a means to <var 1A 02 /var>receive<var 1A 01 /var> of them. For that, we must needs imbue it with the Exarch's innate gift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000460_URIANGER<tab>Хоть сосуды и обладают всеми свойствами для <var 1A 02 /var>удержания<var 1A 01 /var> души и памяти, поныне у нас нет способа <var 1A 02 /var>поместить<var 1A 01 /var> их туда. Для исполнения сего нам воспотребуется сокровенный дар Экзарха.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000470_YSHTOLA<tab>A gift that lives on only through the blood of the Allagan emperors...which certainly does not flow within auracite, or any other crystal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000470_YSHTOLA<tab>Дар, который несёт в себе кровь аллаганских императоров... а ею, это уж точно, нельзя напитать ни аурацит, ни какой другой кристалл.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000480_URIANGER<tab>Just so, milady. The blood serveth as a conduit of sorts─in its absence, memory cannot pass from mind unto mind, nor from flesh unto crystal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000480_URIANGER<tab>Истинно так, миледи. А кровь служит своего рода связующим звеном — в его отсутствии память не соединится с телом, и не перейдёт из кристалла.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That being the case, we must either alter the process of inheritance so as to require no such thing, or determine a means by which my blood may permeate the vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Теперь, когда проблема известна, мы либо должны разработать альтернативный процесс переноса души в сосуд, либо придумать метод, которым моей кровью сей сосуд получится усилить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am hopeful that the records found within this tower will yield the knowledge we require to pursue one or the other of these avenues.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Надеюсь, что записи, хранимые в этой башне, помогут нам — будь то первый или второй способ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000510_BEQLUGG<tab>As well you should be! The Allagans' body of aetherological research is extraordinary. I can scarce believe it the work of ages past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000510_BEQLUGG<tab>И надежда небезосновательна! Исследования аллагцев в области эфирологии поражают воображение. Поверить не могу, что записям несколько веков.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000520_BEQLUGG<tab>But its underlying principles are not so very different from those of my own field of study. Given time, we will find the answers we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000520_BEQLUGG<tab>Тем не менее, основополагающие принципы не так уж отличаются от результатов моих исследований. Со временем, думаю, мы найдём ответы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I know that you can ill afford to wait, and it pains me that I must ask you to do so. I can only reaffirm my promise to you that a solution will be found.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Знаю, что времени совсем нет, и всё же прошу тебя подождать ещё немного. Могу лишь уверить — я сдержу обещание и найду ответ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Whatever it takes, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> see you safely home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Чего бы это ни стоило, я верну вас домой!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000550_LYNA<tab>My apologies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000550_LYNA<tab>Прошу простить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I do hope you haven't come to tell us that mortal peril fast approaches.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Надеюсь, ты здесь не для того, чтобы сообщить о приближении смертельной опасности...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000570_LYNA<tab>No. I had hoped to speak with the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000570_LYNA<tab>Нет. Я надеялась перекинуться парой слов с Воином Тьмы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000580_LYNA<tab>But there is no need to cut short your meeting on my account. I will be waiting outside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000580_LYNA<tab>Но я не прошу из-за меня прерывать встречу. Я подожду снаружи.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Why not speak in here─she knows I don't mind. Unless she didn't want to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Почему бы не здесь, она же знает, я не против... Разве что, у неё свои секреты?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps I might accompany you? Though I am woefully ill-qualified to assist in the Exarch's research, I may yet be of some use to Lyna.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Давай лучше я пойду с тобой? Увы, для помощи в изысканиях Экзарха моей квалификации явно недостаточно. Может, хоть Лине чем-нибудь пригожусь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000610_LYNA<tab>Did you slay this eater? Your orders were to await the main force before engaging.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000610_LYNA<tab>Это вы убили пожирателя? Вам же приказали ждать подкрепления и не вступать в бой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000620_RESOLUTESOLDIER<tab>No, Captain! It wasn't us, I swear it! A man came out of nowhere and cut it down before we knew what was happening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000620_RESOLUTESOLDIER<tab>Нет, капитан! Это не мы, честное слово! Откуда ни возьмись появился какой-то мужик и убил пожирателя - мы и удивиться не успели.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000630_LYNA<tab>By himself? Certainly it is no Lightwarden, but nevertheless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000630_LYNA<tab>Сам убил? Конечно, это не Страж Света, но тем не менее...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000640_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)It's true! Felled it with a single swing of his axe, he did! Never seen anything like it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000640_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)Это правда! Тварь убита одним ударом топора! Никогда такого не видел!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000650_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)So I says to him, “Who are you, the Warrior of bleedin' Darkness!?”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000650_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)Ну я его и спрашиваю: "Ты кто такой, чёртов Воин Тьмы или как?!"

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000660_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)And he says, “No, I'm a Warrior of Light.” And that was it. Buggered off as quick as he came.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000660_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)А он мне: "Нет, я Воин Света". И был таков. Ушёл так же быстро, как и появился.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>A Warrior of <var 1A 02 /var>Light<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Воин... Света?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000680_SOLDIER03608<tab>Why would someone go around calling himself that, though? It was those bastards who caused the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000680_SOLDIER03608<tab>С чего бы кому-то так себя называть? Это ж те мерзавцы, из-за которых случился Прилив!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000690_SOLDIER03608<tab>I mean, if you were going to pretend to be anyone, it'd be <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var><var 1A 01 /var>─the Warrior of Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000690_SOLDIER03608<tab>В смысле, если бы он и хотел закосить под героя, наверняка представился бы Воином Тени!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000700_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)Eh? Oh! I─ I didn't know! It's an honor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000700_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)Э? Ой! Я... Я не знал! Это большая честь!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000710_LYNA<tab>Since the eater is no longer a threat, our work here is done. Return to your posts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000710_LYNA<tab>Поскольку пожиратель нам больше не угрожает, здесь нам делать нечего. Возвращайтесь на свои посты.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000720_SOLDIER03608<tab>I had hoped to fight at your side today... But I'll continue to follow your example─and may we meet again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000720_SOLDIER03608<tab>Я надеялся сегодня сразиться вместе с вами... Но тогда просто продолжу следовать вашему примеру - и надеяться, что мы снова встретимся!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000730_LYNA<tab>I apologize for the wasted journey. It seems I overestimated the threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000730_LYNA<tab>Прошу прощения за потраченное время. Похоже, я переоценила угрозу.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000740_LYNA<tab>As for this “Warrior of Light”... I do not know who would be brazen enough to take that mantle for his own. Whatever it may once have meant, it is forever tainted by the association with the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000740_LYNA<tab>А что касается этого "Воина Света"... Надо быть самоуверенным донельзя, чтобы облачиться в такую мантию. Может, в прошлом это значило что-то другое, но ныне эти два слова крепко связаны с Приливом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000750_LYNA<tab>The Exarch told me the truth of Ardbert and his comrades' deeds, and I am aware they played some part in your own triumph. But to most, they are synonymous with the calamity that befell this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000750_LYNA<tab>Экзарх рассказал мне правду об Ардберте и его товарищах, и я в курсе, что он сыграл некую роль и в вашем триумфе. Но для остальных это синоним катаклизма, обрушившегося на этот мир.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000760_LYNA<tab>Still, if this man is minded to destroy sin eaters, I may forgive him his unfortunate choice of alias.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000760_LYNA<tab>В любом случае, если он собирается истреблять пожирателей, можно простить его за неудачный выбор псевдонима.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000770_LYNA<tab>But that is neither here nor there. I thank you for accompanying me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000770_LYNA<tab>Но сейчас это к делу не относится. Спасибо вам, что согласились пойти со мной.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>With that concluded, shall we return to the Crystarium? There is a proposal I should like to make...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Теперь, когда с этим покончено, не пора ли нам вернуться в Кристариум? Есть предложение, которое мне хотелось бы внести...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000790_LYNA<tab>Forgive me. There is one more thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000790_LYNA<tab>Простите. Есть ещё кое-что...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000800_LYNA<tab>A personal concern of mine. I had hoped you might have a moment to speak privately.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000800_LYNA<tab>Одно личное дело. Я надеялась, что вы позволите нам поговорить наедине.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Take your time. I shall go on ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Без проблем. Я потихоньку пойду вперёд.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000820_LYNA<tab>I will not mince words. This matter concerns the Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000820_LYNA<tab>Ладно, не будем тянуть резину. Дело касается Экзарха.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000830_LYNA<tab>Though his countenance belies his age, his demeanor never has. He has seen more than any man should, and grown ever more weary with time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000830_LYNA<tab>Хотя его поведение не соответствует возрасту, внешний вид - напротив. Он повидал куда больше, чем кто-либо, и устал, во всех смыслах...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000840_LYNA<tab>But I see I give the wrong impression. While it is true he attempted to open a letter with his salmon fillet the other evening, we are not here because I suspect his mind is deteriorating.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000840_LYNA<tab>Ладно, я вас так только запутаю. Конечно, это правда, что он однажды сунул нос в мою банку с рыбным филе, но мы с вами здесь не потому, что я беспокоюсь, будто его начало одолевать слабоумие.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000850_LYNA<tab>Nor do I believe him to be so maddeningly unconcerned by the prospect of his own death as he once was. Indeed, the opposite is true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000850_LYNA<tab>А теперь он не настолько легкомысленно относится к собственной смерти, как однажды. Теперь всё наоборот.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000860_LYNA<tab>It is for this reason that I seek your advice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000860_LYNA<tab>Как раз поэтому я прошу вашего совета.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000870_LYNA<tab>Since he returned from the Tempest, the Exarch is...not as he was.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000870_LYNA<tab>С тех пор, как он вернулся из Пучины, Экзарх... изменился.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000880_LYNA<tab>He seems a different man. A <var 1A 02 /var>younger<var 1A 01 /var> man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000880_LYNA<tab>Он стал другим человеком. Моложе, что ли...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000890_LYNA<tab>I know not the details of his research, but when I saw him at work recently, there was a glint in his eye that I had never seen before. He looked <var 1A 02 /var>happy<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000890_LYNA<tab>Не знаю, нам чем они там сейчас работают, но когда я в последний раз его видела, в его глазах было удивительное сияние. Он будто... счастлив.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000900_LYNA<tab>It was as if he had peered into the future, and for the first time, found joy there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000900_LYNA<tab>Словно бы он заглянул в будущее, и на этот раз увидел там радостные вещи.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000910_LYNA<tab>Though it gladdens me to see him thus, I wonder if I should not keep my distance. I fear that my presence will only anchor him to the past. Remind him of all the pain that came before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000910_LYNA<tab>Конечно, я рада видеть его таким, но думаю, не следует ли мне теперь держать расстояние... Боюсь, моё присутствие будет привязывать его к прошлому. Напоминать о всей той боли, через которую пришлось пройти.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Anchors keep us where we have chosen to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Мы сами решаем, к чему себя привязать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>He's lost without you, you know. And he misses you already.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Знаешь, он без тебя совсем не тот. Думаю, он скучает.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000920_LYNA<tab>...Is that so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000920_LYNA<tab>...В самом деле?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000930_LYNA<tab>He─ Are you sure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000930_LYNA<tab>Он... Вы уверены?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000940_LYNA<tab>Then perhaps we might remain as we were. As we have always been.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000940_LYNA<tab>Тогда, наверное, лучше оставить всё как есть. Как и было до этого...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000950_LYNA<tab>What a relief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000950_LYNA<tab>Какое облегчение.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000960_LYNA<tab>In that case, I will have to speak with him about the amount of time he is spending at work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000960_LYNA<tab>В таком случае, поговорю с ним. Кажется, он слишком много времени посвящает работе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000970_LYNA<tab>This research is important, I know, but if he refuses to consider his own health, I will have to consider it for him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000970_LYNA<tab>Его исследования важны, несомненно, но если он решил забыть про собственное здоровье, я напомню ему об этом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, this looks to be nearly everyone. Let us begin, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Да, похоже, это все желающие. Тогда, начинаем?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though I am usually the first to hold forth at such events, I think, on this occasion, that honor should fall to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Как правило, в подобных ситуациях я начинаю первым, но в данном случае, думаю, честь должна принадлежать тебе.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>They <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be more inclined to take the word of the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>Они куда охотнее выслушают Воина Тьмы.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001010_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. In light of the subject matter, who better than thee to speak these truths?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001010_URIANGER<tab>Истинно так. В свете произошедшего никто более не подойдёт для сего рассказа.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001020_SOLDIER03608<tab>Wicked white... The Warriors of Light did all that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001020_SOLDIER03608<tab>Клянусь тенями... Воины Света всё это сделали?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001030_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)So they never─ I mean, they only ever wanted to help? And when everything they'd done turned to ash, they <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> carried on...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001030_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)Так значит они не... То есть, они хотели помочь? И когда всё, чего они добивались, превратилось в ничто, они всё равно продолжили борьбу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001040_SOLDIER03608<tab>They gave everything to stop the Flood... First their lives, then their souls...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001040_SOLDIER03608<tab>Они отдали всё, чтобы остановить Прилив... Сперва свои жизни, а потом свои души...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001050_SOLDIER03608<tab>And they managed it, too─in the end. They <var 1A 02 /var>saved<var 1A 01 /var> us. And we cursed their names.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001050_SOLDIER03608<tab>И они, в конце концов, справились. Они спасли нас! А мы проклинаем их имена.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001060_ALPHINAUD<tab>This should go a long way towards clearing the air.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Да уж, сейчас им будет что обсудить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Impossible...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Невозможно!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You can see him too?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Вы тоже это видите?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I take it I'm not imagining this, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Похоже, мне не кажется.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>I definitely see <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var>. You don't think it's a ghost, do you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ну, я точно вижу... нечто. Ты же не думаешь, что это призрак?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001090_URIANGER<tab>Nay. Yonder standeth no bloodless apparition, but a Warrior of Light and Darkness both. Ardbert.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001090_URIANGER<tab>Нет. Сие не бесплотное созданье, но Воин Света и Тьмы. Ардберт.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001100_YSHTOLA<tab>What in the world...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001100_YSHTOLA<tab>Да что происходит?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001110_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)It's you! The one who slew the eater...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001110_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)Это ты! Тот, что убил того пожирателя...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001120_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)That it should be the Warrior of Darkness who brought the truth to light... You've saved me a fair bit of time─though I have a few words of my own to say, if I may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001120_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Надо же, Воин Тьмы извлёк истину на свет... Ты <var 08 E905 ((сэкономила)) ((сэкономил)) /var> для меня немного времени - хотя мне и самому есть что сказать, если позволите.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001130_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)People of the Crystarium! I am Ardbert, one of those you know as a Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001130_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Народ Кристариума! Я Ардберт - тот, кого вы однажды знали под именем Воина Света.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001140_SOLDIER03608<tab>That's impossible! You should be dead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001140_SOLDIER03608<tab>Невозможно! Ты же умер...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001150_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Aye, that I should. But as the world has been given new life, so too have I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001150_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)И то верно. Но миру была дана новая жизнь, как и мне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001160_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)I know not why I, and I alone, have been gifted this chance. But I do know this: only by the will of the star itself could such a miracle come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001160_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Не знаю, почему именно мне, и мне одному, был дарован этот шанс. Но вот что я знаю точно: только воля самой планеты способна свершить подобное чудо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001170_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)The hero who stands before you now─the Warrior of Darkness─is not of this world. And the day will come when <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> must return to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001170_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)<var 08 E905 ((Героиня, стоящая)) ((Герой, стоящий)) /var> перед вами - Воин Тьмы - не принадлежит этому миру. Настанет день, когда <var 08 E905 ((она должна)) ((он должен)) /var> будет вернуться домой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001180_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But this land is <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> home. And if it is to remain so, now and forevermore, it is <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> who must protect it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001180_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Но эта земля - наш дом. Так и будет, вовеки веков, и теперь мы должны будем её защищать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001190_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)The time to rely on saviors from afar has passed. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who must rise. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> who must become the new Warriors of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001190_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Довольно полагаться на спасителей-чужаков. Теперь вы должны занять их место. Вы должны стать новыми Воинами Света!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001200_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)Wha─ Us? Warriors of Light?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001200_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Подтянутый стражник-)К... Кто, мы? Воины Света?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001210_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)None of us were born heroes, my friend. I was only ever a man with a thirst for adventure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001210_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Героями не рождаются, друг мой. Однажды я был обычным парнем с жаждой приключений.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001220_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But wherever my journeys took me, I was invariably confronted with the same choice: to lend what aid I could to those in need─or not. And I always chose the former.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001220_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Но куда бы меня не заносило в моих странствиях, я неизменно сталкивался с единственным выбором - протянуть руку помощи нуждающимся или нет. И я всегда выбирал первое.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001230_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Any one of you could do the same. All you need is the will to help your fellow man, and the resolve to see it through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001230_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ардберт-)Каждый из вас может так же. Всё, что тут нужно - желание помочь ближнему, да решимость, чтоб довести дело до конца.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001240_URIANGER<tab>From thine own lips did we learn of Ardbert's fate, and by thy countenance, I gather thou art not inclined to recant thy testimony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001240_URIANGER<tab>С твоих слов мы узнали, какая судьба постигла Ардберта в конце, и насколько я вразумел, от сего пересказа событий ты отказываться не станешь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001250_URIANGER<tab>Yet whosoever this man may be, his words hold truth─and resonate with the citizenry besides. For us to voice our doubts here and now would serve but to sow disquiet. 'Twere better we retired unto the Ocular, and there discussed this matter in private.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001250_URIANGER<tab>Тем не меньше, кем бы ни был сей человек, его речи несут истину - а вдобавок отзываются в сердцах. Озвучить наши сомнения здесь и сейчас означает посеять раздор. Лучше всего ныне вернуться в Линзу, где у нас будет довольно времени потолковать наедине.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Go. I will stay here and watch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Идите. Я останусь здесь и буду наблюдать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So that is a Warrior of Light of the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Итак, это Воин Света Первого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001271_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have not had the pleasure of making his acquaintance, but as you all seem to be in agreement, I gather this is no simple case of mistaken identity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001271_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Не имел удовольствия быть ему представленным, но вы, как я вижу, единогласны, а поэтому буду считать, что личность его установлена верно.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001280_BEQLUGG<tab>As far as I was able to discern, that was indeed Ardbert. It has been a long time, but not that long. Could he truly have been resurrected as he claims?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001280_BEQLUGG<tab>Если память меня не подводит, это и в самом деле был Ардберт. Да, давненько это было - но не так уж давно. Действительно, мог ли он воскреснуть, как он сам заявляет?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>. Absolutely not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>...Нет. Точно не мог.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It looks like him and sounds like him. But it <var 1A 02 /var>isn't<var 1A 01 /var> him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Выглядит и звучит, как он. Но это НЕ он.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001290_URIANGER<tab>Ardbert did entrust his very soul unto thee. I see no reason to question thy judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001290_URIANGER<tab>Ардберт доверил тебе собственную душу. Не вижу причин не довериться твоим суждениям.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001300_YSHTOLA<tab>Nor I. To my eyes, your aether burns as brightly as the day you slew Emet-Selch. That is proof that he is with you still.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001300_YSHTOLA<tab>Я тоже. Я вижу, что твой эфир горит так же ярко, как и в день, когда был убит Эмет-Селх. Вот доказательство, что он всё ещё с тобой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001310_URIANGER<tab>Yet that which standeth now before the people is far more than a passing imitation. I am reminded of the Cardinal Virtues...though a sin eater he is not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001310_URIANGER<tab>Но то, что сегодня стояло пред людьми, не просто хитроумная иллюзия. Мне мигом вспомнились Смертные Добродетели... хоть он явно не пожиратель.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001320_URIANGER<tab>Which leaveth but one plausible explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001320_URIANGER<tab>Остаётся лишь одно удобоваримое объяснение.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001330_YSHTOLA<tab>That he is an Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001330_YSHTOLA<tab>Это асцианец.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Given their fondness for posthumous possession, I would have to agree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Учитывая их необычайную любовь селиться в трупах, соглашусь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>From what I understand, the Warriors of Light were laid to rest in Eulmore by those whom they had aided in life. At the time, some few still remembered them as heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Из того что нам известно, Воины Света были похоронены близ Юлмора теми, кому они успели помочь при жизни. Думается мне, некоторые и поныне там считают их героями.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Needless to say, four of them were subsequently exhumed to serve as the Virtues. And if one knew where to look, Ardbert too would not have been difficult to find.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Не нужно, думаю, напоминать, что четыре могилы из пяти были вскрыты, а мертвецы стали Благодетелями. Для тех, кто знал где искать, добраться до тела Ардберта труда не составляло.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>Assuming then that this is indeed the work of an Ascian, my mind inevitably turns to the last remaining Paragon to survive the sundering...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>Если в этом деле и правда замешан асцианец, на ум каждый раз невольно приходит последний оставшийся Предвечный, избежавший Раскола...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001380_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001380_URIANGER<tab>Элидибус.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001390_URIANGER<tab>That Zenos hath reclaimed his own flesh is known.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001390_URIANGER<tab>Известно, что Зенос возвернулся в собственное тело.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001400_URIANGER<tab>Thus evicted from his borrowed form...and cognizant, no doubt, of Emet-Selch's failure here in the First...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001400_URIANGER<tab>А посему, изгнанный из былой плоти... и будучи, без сомнений, в курсе неудачи Эмет-Селха на Первом...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001410_URIANGER<tab>'Tis quite possible the emissary chose Ardbert for his next vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001410_URIANGER<tab>Вполне вероятно, Эмиссар избрал Ардберта следующим сосудом.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001420_BEQLUGG<tab>Inhabiting the flesh of the fallen... My, that is unsavory. And they do this often, you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001420_BEQLUGG<tab>Вселяться в покойников... Неприятные подробности. И как часто они это, говорите, проделывают?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001430_URIANGER<tab>Verily, for they possess no corporeal forms of their own. In what one may term their natural state, none save those gifted with the Echo can perceive them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001430_URIANGER<tab>Изрядно, ведь они не обладают собственной физической формой. В таком - как иные бы молвили, своём естественном, - состоянии они незримы; разве что, одарённые Эхом могут их обнаружить.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001440_URIANGER<tab>Indeed, when Elidibus intruded upon the Waking Sands, his presence did go unmarked by all save Minfilia and the Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001440_URIANGER<tab>В самом деле, когда Элидибус вторгся в "Шепчущие пески", он остался никем не замеченным, окромя Минфилии и Воина Света.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001450_URIANGER<tab>On that occasion, I myself remained ignorant of his coming until after his departure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001450_URIANGER<tab>Должен признать, я и сам оставался в неведении - до самого момента отбытия нашего врага.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001460_URIANGER<tab>'Twas only at a later juncture, when he deigned to appear before me in borrowed flesh that I was finally able to take the measure of him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001460_URIANGER<tab>Лишь гораздо позже, когда он самовольно явился пред мои очи - в позаимствованной плоти - я, наконец, смог оценить его.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001470_URIANGER<tab>In such puppetry do the Ascians engage when they seek to influence the course of history.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001470_URIANGER<tab>Асцианцы прибегают к нечестивому и грязному в своём стремленьи направлять ход истории.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>And they have gained much by it. Emet-Selch single-handedly built the Garlean Empire in this manner, while Lahabrea came close to conquering Eorzea having taken possession of Thancred's living body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>И у них неплохо получается. Эмет-Селх своими руками построил Гарлеанскую империю, в то время как Лахабреа почти сумел завоевать Эорзию, захватив при этом тело Танкреда.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001490_URIANGER<tab>Yet it must needs be noted that the Ascians cannot avail themselves of <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> mortal vessels. For were they able to do so, none would serve as a better pawn than our own redoubtable champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001490_URIANGER<tab>Стоит заметить, асцианцы не в силах занять прямо-таки любой смертный сосуд. Ежели таковое было бы возможно, что стало бы лучшей фигурой в партии, чем <var 08 E905 ((наша незаменимая героиня)) ((наш незаменимый герой)) /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001500_URIANGER<tab>Mayhap the blessing of Light shieldeth Hydaelyn's chosen from Ascian influence. Or mayhap other forces are at work. We cannot say for certain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001500_URIANGER<tab>Может статься, се Благословение Света укрывает избранн(ую) Хайделин от влияния асцианцев. А может, тут задействованы иные силы - сие нам неведомо.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Whatever the reason, I hope it holds true. I dare not contemplate what might come to pass otherwise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Какими бы ни были причины, я надеюсь, это правда. Представить не могу, что случилось бы, если бы в самом деле произошло подобное.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Is it not peculiar, then, that Ardbert's mortal remains should be susceptible, given that he was once a Warrior of Light? Or did the final departure of his soul make it possible, perhaps?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Тогда разве это не странно, что в останки Ардберта можно было вселиться? Ведь он однажды был Воином Света. Хотя, если его душа отбыла навеки, это стало возможным?..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001530_YSHTOLA<tab>Regardless, to hear an Ascian use him to call forth new Warriors of Light boggles the mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001530_YSHTOLA<tab>В любом случае, сейчас я слышу, как асцианец скликает новых Воинов Света, и мне от этого дурно.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001540_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus hath ever been an enigma, his ostensible purpose being to preserve the balance between Light and Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001540_URIANGER<tab>Элидибус и посейчас для всех загадка, окромя его единого предназначения - хранить равновесие меж Светом и Тьмой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001550_URIANGER<tab>When he made overtures towards me, however, I was afforded a glimpse behind the mask of the self-appointed emissary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001550_URIANGER<tab>Покуда он делал мне свои предложенья и мы заключали договор, мне удалось немного, если позволите так выразиться, приподнять маску сего самозваного Эмиссара.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001560_URIANGER<tab>I shall not defend mine actions, undertaken in pursuit of a better understanding of our foe, as either wise or prudent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001560_URIANGER<tab>Не стану оправдывать свои действия, пускай и предпринятые в попытке больше разузнать о нашем враге, к добру то иль к худу.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001570_URIANGER<tab>Nevertheless, what little I did glean may now prove useful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001570_URIANGER<tab>Однако ж то, что я успел о нём понять, может оказаться нам полезным.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001580_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus possesseth a subtle mind, practiced in the art of manipulation. That he coaxed this star's most valiant heroes as far as the Source with naught save half-truths is no trifling feat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001580_URIANGER<tab>Разум Элидибуса скрытен, и манипулировать он горазд изрядно. Он завёл самых доблестных из героев сего мира аж на Источник, используя ложь и подлоги, а сие уже немало.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001590_URIANGER<tab>And now, I believe, he doth employ his skills once more to some as-yet-unknown end. Though naught is certain, should my suspicions prove true, we shall have need of all our wits if we are to uncover─and thereafter thwart─his plot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001590_URIANGER<tab>Надо полагать, он вновь намерен задействовать свои умения - разве что цель его нам неясна. Ныне мы ступаем в неизведанное, и вскоре нам потребуется вся наша изворотливость, дабы раскрыть - и после предотвратить - его замысел.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Agreed. 'Tis plain that simply speaking out against him will not avail us. At best, it would only serve to confuse the people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Согласен. И так понятно, что попросту выступить против него не получится. В лучшем случае мы только запутаем людей.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And I would hesitate to do anything which might tarnish Ardbert's reputation once more, nor yours by association.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>К тому же, я бы не торопился снова подрывать репутацию Ардберта - и твою за компанию.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That being the case, it may be wise to keep a covert eye on this “Ardbert's” movements as we attempt to discern his purpose and how best to mitigate his influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Итак, в данный момент было бы мудро приглядывать за передвижениями этого "Ардберта", если мы намерены разгадать его цели и успеть решить, как лучше всего ему помешать.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001630_BEQLUGG<tab>His performance appears to have concluded. What now─go back out and follow him?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001630_BEQLUGG<tab>Похоже, его выступление закончилось. Что теперь - одному из нас следить за ним?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001640_URIANGER<tab>'Twould appear Master Alphinaud already hath pursuit in mind, and I suspect one pair of eyes shall better serve our cause than half a dozen. Let the rest of us maintain an inconspicuous distance─for the present, at least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001640_URIANGER<tab>Полагаю, господин Альфино как раз за сим там и остался - но надо думать, одна пара глаз в сим деле сработает лучше полудюжины. Остальным, однако, следует сохранять внушительное расстояние - по крайней мере, ныне.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001650_ALMET<tab>Come. Our new discoveries are to be found this way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001660_YSHTOLA<tab>The people of Ronka are known to have venerated animals, but these features do not match those of any indigenous species. This is no common beast.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001670_YSHTOLA<tab>Though that much is plain from its proportions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001680_CYMET<tab>Lifelike, is it not? One could almost imagine it breathed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001690_UIMET<tab>Grrr!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001700_CYMET<tab>Aaah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001710_UIMET<tab>Hahaha!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001711_CYMET<tab>Why, you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>This owl, by contrast, seems no different from the others we've seen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001730_ALMET<tab>The sealed door lies ahead.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001740_ALMET<tab>As you see, one statue is missing. I expect we are meant to replace it, as before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>Too simple. There will be some additional defense mechanism.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001760_YSHTOLA<tab>Just a moment─there are words carved into the stone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>He...who would disturb...a hero's deserved slumber...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001780_YSHTOLA<tab>Shall instead...waken the beast...and know...his folly...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001790_YSHTOLA<tab>Wait! Don't!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001800_UIMET<tab>Wh-What? But I only─ What is happening!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001810_CYMET<tab>Oh no... Oh no, no, no... I-It lives!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001820_YSHTOLA<tab>Why am I not surprised? Prepare yourselves!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem the magicks have returned us. How polite.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Now, what have we learned?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001850_UIMET<tab>Oh, we were bound to run into a living statue eventually. And now we can open the door!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001860_YSHTOLA<tab>“He who would disturb a hero's deserved slumber...”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001870_YSHTOLA<tab>A tomb, just as I thought. Befitting a hero.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001880_ALMET<tab>She is Viis! Could it be the archmage Tiuna?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001890_ALMET<tab>A legendary hero of Ronka, as you surmised. The tales tell of how she smote entire armies with a single incantation, so potent was her spellcraft─though she ever fought in the name of peace.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001900_UIMET<tab>I thought them no more than tales. To think she really existed...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001910_CYMET<tab>Well, I for one always believed!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001920_YSHTOLA<tab>I wonder...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001930_YSHTOLA<tab>By the light...of fallen stars...great power awakens...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001940_ALMET<tab>Tiuna was not only a master of spellcraft. It is said she could see truths long lost and hear the voices of men's hearts.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001950_YSHTOLA<tab>Naught less than the Echo.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>In which case...none of this is mere coincidence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001970_YSHTOLA<tab>A shower of stars setting the sky aflame─and in both this world and the Source, we find individuals within whom a mysterious power awakened at the sight.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001980_YSHTOLA<tab>We could never unpick the why of it. Now, however...I believe we might.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001990_YSHTOLA<tab>Does the scene depicted here not resemble the one we saw when we first ventured into the Qitana Ravel?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002000_YSHTOLA<tab>Moreover, does it not recall that which Emet-Selch invited us to witness in Amaurot?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002010_YSHTOLA<tab>The Final Days.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002020_YSHTOLA<tab>If, as the Exarch's research suggests, soul and mind share a fragile yet profound bond, might it not be possible for an event to leave such a deep imprint upon the soul that it could be perceived eons later─given a suitable trigger?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002030_YSHTOLA<tab>The Echo defies explanation by conventional aetherological theory. Or shall we say, modern aetherological theory.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002040_YSHTOLA<tab>But if it is a power that once belonged to the ancients, to souls yet undivided...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002045_YSHTOLA<tab>...Ah.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem I have entered the realm of pure speculation. And I call myself a scholar.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002060_YSHTOLA<tab>I shall refrain from making any further wild claims until such time as I have evidence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002070_YSHTOLA<tab>Still, I cannot choose but be reminded of our experience in Amaurot...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then you must recall Emet-Selch's dying request.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will not soon forget it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002080_YSHTOLA<tab>“Remember us.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002090_ALMET<tab>“History is learned, not lived.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002100_ALMET<tab>We have always protected the tales of Ronka, just as we have protected this place. But we are mindful of what our mothers taught us.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002110_ALMET<tab>We see the past through our own eyes, and speak of it with our own words. Thus do we come to understand it, in our own way. But this is not the same as remembering.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>Your mothers were wise.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002130_YSHTOLA<tab>Though we witnessed the Final Days, our impressions could not fail to be colored by our own experiences and expectations. Those who lived through it would have perceived the event quite differently.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002140_YSHTOLA<tab>We must bear in mind that it is no simple matter to keep the truth alive, or it will die with Emet-Selch and his kin.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002150_YSHTOLA<tab>But we have disturbed Tiuna long enough. Fanow will serve similarly well as a venue for our contemplations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002160_THANCRED<tab>If you were hoping to vent your frustrations on our eater friend here, I can only apologize.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002170_RYNE<tab>Few as they are now, it took us no time at all to track it down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>That suits our purpose perfectly. Now we need only wait for Ardbert to arrive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002190_ALISAIE<tab>Weren't you two meant to be attending to the Empty?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002200_THANCRED<tab>We were, and are. But we can hardly ignore the rest of the world, so we thought we might see how things were coming along. From what we can gather, the answer is “strangely.”

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002210_THANCRED<tab>We were indeed, and we've made a certain amount of progress. So we thought we might see how the rest of the world was getting on. From what we can gather, the answer is “strangely.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002220_RYNE<tab>Right now, we think we can do more good here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>It is heartening to have all present.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed! We will be glad of the additional hands should matters escalate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002250_URIANGER<tab>Our quarry is come.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002260_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Hah. It seems I've lost this particular race.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002270_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Ah, though I suppose it's only fair.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002280_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)When we first met, it was I who outpaced you. Ravana, was it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002290_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But where are my manners? I wouldn't be here were it not for you, and I have yet to say a word of thanks!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Extend a friendly fist.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ask whether he wishes Seto were here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002300_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Arm giving you trouble? You should have it examined.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002310_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Poor fellow. He will be sorely missed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Indeed...<var 1A 02 /var>Ardbert<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were supposed to be good at this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002320_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)Very well. Let us forgo this pretense.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002330_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)Very well. Let us forgo this pretense.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002340_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)After all, it was never you that I needed to deceive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)After all, it was never you that I needed to deceive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002360_ELIDIBUS<tab>Yes, it is I, Elidibus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002370_ELIDIBUS<tab>Through your time in Emet-Selch's imitation of our home, I daresay you have gained a better understanding of my role since last we met. Not that it matters.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>We understand your role, Emissary, but not your goal. What is it that you seek to achieve?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002390_ELIDIBUS<tab>I seek to enact the will of the Convocation, of course. If it helps you to think of me as but another Ascian, no different in nature or purpose from the rest, you are welcome to do so.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once, I would have said your goal was destruction alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Now I understand that you fight for something you love, just as we do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yet though we seem doomed to clash, I bid you consider Emet-Selch's final words.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Remember that we once lived,” he said. Had he not seen some glimmer of hope in our kind, I do not believe he would have spoken thus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002440_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Remember that we once lived,” he said. Had he not seen some glimmer of hope in our kind, I do not believe he would have spoken thus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002450_YSHTOLA<tab>None better understood your plight than he. His words must surely be worthy of your consideration.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002460_ELIDIBUS<tab>Emet-Selch...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002470_ELIDIBUS<tab>How very unlike you, to err so gravely.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002480_ELIDIBUS<tab>That one should stray at the end of so onerous a path is understandable, but I had thought you above such weakness. Mayhap you thought the same. Would that I had been present to offer correction...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002490_ELIDIBUS<tab>But I shall do so now, as is my duty, and return all to its proper course.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002500_ELIDIBUS<tab>As for you... Look at yourselves. Look at your <var 1A 02 /var>history<var 1A 01 /var>. Look back one hundred short years, to how your greatest warriors were undone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002510_ELIDIBUS<tab>And now? At but a word from me, you raise your hands in answer like the puppets you are.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002515_ELIDIBUS<tab>Naught has changed.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002520_ELIDIBUS<tab>You fail and you fail and you learn nothing─allow that which is most important to slip through your fumbling fingers like so many grains of sand. Again and again and <var 1A 02 /var>again<var 1A 01 /var>. And you would remember <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>? You do forget yourselves.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002530_ELIDIBUS<tab>There is no common ground to be found between you and I. Nor do I require any.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002540_ELIDIBUS<tab>I have my duty.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>Wait!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well...we have confirmed the identity of our foe, at least. And 'tis safe to say his objective is the Rejoining.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002570_ALISAIE<tab>But we still have no idea how playing the part of a Warrior of Light will further his cause, nor why he would spur others to do the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002580_YSHTOLA<tab>Another visit to the Tempest may shed some light upon these mysteries.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>Whether we are to exchange words or blows with Elidibus at our next meeting, the fact remains: we know too little.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002600_YSHTOLA<tab>Ere our paths cross again, I would learn more of the world that once was─and of Elidibus himself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>In this, we would be best served going directly to his home, much as Emet-Selch came to ours.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002620_URIANGER<tab>Though I see the wisdom in thy suggestion, the Amaurot we visited is but a phantom born of Emet-Selch's memory. I fear it will teach us little that we do not already know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>I quite agree. Yet the ruins of the actual city remain unexplored.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002640_YSHTOLA<tab>Given the vastness of the Tempest, I should not be surprised were there more such structures like to those in which the Ondo reside.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If there's aught to be learned, I want to know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>For want of a better option...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>As long as you don't make me do any more chores.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002650_YSHTOLA<tab>A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>Mayhap your skepticism will leaven my curiosity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002670_YSHTOLA<tab>Keep that up and I'll send you to bed without supper.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Assuming we are all in agreement, then, I suggest we first pay a visit to the Ondo. If anyone can tell us where more ruins are to be found, it is them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002690_YSHTOLA<tab>This structure must have served an important function. And here are yet more crystals...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>I too noted the crystal repository on the way. The benthos seem to employ them in their spellcasting.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002710_URIANGER<tab>In such vessels did the ancients preserve concepts─ideal forms to be drawn upon in the act of creation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002720_URIANGER<tab>That so great an abundance should reside here lendeth credence to Y'shtola's conclusion. This facility held great significance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002730_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Thank you all for joining us at Anyder in these most perilous of times.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002740_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>By the summoning of Zodiark have we been granted a reprieve. Yet immutable as the laws He has woven may seem, they will not serve to forestall our doom.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002750_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Nay. Should we continue down this path, our fate will be the same.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002760_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I said as much to the Convocation, of course, but the stubborn fools turned a deaf ear to my warnings.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002770_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I had hoped that the defector, at least, would side with us, but I regret to report our overtures have gone unanswered.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002780_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Whither tend your thoughts, Venat? Where you lead, we will follow.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002790_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I shall not speak ill of the Convocation─they too seek only to secure the future of our star.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002800_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yet it is plain they will not countenance a permanent solution. That being the case, we must ask ourselves a simple question: are we prepared to pursue our chosen course, even should it mean suffering the eternal condemnation of our brethren?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002810_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If so, I see no further reason to demur.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002820_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let us bring forth the Light that shall ever after keep the Darkness in check.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002830_YSHTOLA<tab>So...it was they who first summoned Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Their discussion did seem to imply as much, yes. I cannot say I have ever heard of this “Venat” before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002850_URIANGER<tab>For a certainty, Emet-Selch never uttered the name, speak though he did of the schism which Zodiark's advent wrought upon mankind.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002860_URIANGER<tab>Some were of the viewpoint that His power must needs be restrained, and to that end did they call forth She who would serve as His shackles.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002870_URIANGER<tab>We know now that it was this Venat to whom they looked for leadership.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>And that this place, in all likelihood, served as their headquarters. The presence of such intimate records attests to that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>I would hear what else they have to tell us. All of it. Did anyone see the source of the image?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>The device there? Then let us see what other secrets it holds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002910_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Venat, please... Why must it be you?<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002920_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If I may speak plainly, I would sooner it were another─<var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> other. You are our <var 1A 02 /var>leader<var 1A 01 /var>. None can take your place.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002930_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You know as well as I that but few support our cause. Far fewer than they who place their faith in Zodiark.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002940_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If Hydaelyn is to stand a chance of opposing Him, I am the only one who might suffice as Her heart.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002950_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Rest assured, however: I shall not vanish from this world. The form I take shall ever remain my choice.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002960_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Then I will press you no more. Only know this...you will be sorely missed.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002970_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I wonder...is this how the Convocation felt about Elidibus?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>What?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, but did that not strongly imply that Elidibus sacrificed himself to become Zodiark's heart?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003000_ALISAIE<tab>Seven hells... Then who─or <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>─are we dealing with?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dare I ask what's going on?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, excellent timing. For me, in any case. We have a problem.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The vast majority of those gathered here are presently in the employ of the guard or else one of the facets...and no longer wish to be so.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In principle, all are free to change vocation at any time─but a city does require a certain number of people in these positions if it is to continue to function. For the moment, I have asked them to postpone their resignation until such time as replacements can be found.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As you may have surmised, we have the “Warrior of Light” to thank for this...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003060_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>It's you! The Warrior of Darkness!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003070_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>You understand, don't you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003080_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>Someone's going to have to look after this place once you're gone. We just want to be ready to do our bit when the time comes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003090_SOLDIER03608<tab>And not only here, but everywhere! Which is why we've got to get out there, and lend a hand to those in need.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003100_SOLDIER03608<tab>That's what you did, isn't it? Even if it was just little things, at the start. You helped people.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>People, chocobos, you name it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well, yes...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003110_SOLDIER03608<tab>And we're trying to do the same! We may have our sky back, but there's no shortage of people who still need help.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003120_SOLDIER03608<tab>Strong and silent─just as a hero should be! You let your actions speak for you, and we mean to do the same. We might have our sky back, but there are still people who need help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003130_SOLDIER03608<tab>If we follow in your footsteps, then I choose to believe we too can be heroes one day. Even Warriors of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>What are we to say to that? We can hardly tell them they are mistaken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003150_ALPHINAUD<tab>They seek but to do good, as you have.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003160_URIANGER<tab>But no more can we stand idly by and suffer a Paragon's scheme to proceed unchallenged.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003170_FEARFULCITIZENA<tab>What...what's happening to the sky?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003180_FEARFULCITIZENB<tab>Aaah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003190_CRYSTARIUMCITIZENA<tab>Wicked white!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003200_CRYSTARIUMCITIZENB<tab>Oh no!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003210_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003220_URIANGER<tab>A starshower...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003221_HYDAELYN<tab>Hear... Feel... Think...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003230_SOLDIER03608<tab>I─ I hear a voice!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003240_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>You and all? Then why does it feel like it's inside my head!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003250_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>Hear... Feel... Think...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003260_CRYSTARIUMCITIZENC<tab>I hear it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003270_CRYSTARIUMCITIZEND<tab>Me too!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003280_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-???-)Did I not tell you, my friends!? You are Warriors of Light!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003290_SOLDIER03608<tab>You're back!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003300_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>What you hear is the voice of Light itself, and it has blessed you with its power. Welcome to the fold!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003310_SOLDIER03608<tab>I'm a Warrior of Light...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003320_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>I've been chosen!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003330_CRYSTARIUMCITIZEND<tab>Can it be?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003340_CRYSTARIUMCITIZENC<tab>Me, a hero?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003360_ALPHINAUD<tab>The falling stars─were they your doing? And why do you need Warriors of Light?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003370_ELIDIBUS<tab>What, am I to reveal my plans simply because you asked?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003380_ELIDIBUS<tab>Nay, I think not─though the stars I acknowledge mine. A convenient illusion apt to awaken what little is left of the power that once resided in your sundered souls.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003390_ELIDIBUS<tab>That which you and yours call the Echo.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003400_ELIDIBUS<tab>And an echo it is. Of a symphony. But a fraction of what men, in their completeness, once possessed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003410_ELIDIBUS<tab>Even those among you who tower over others in the gift have only the faintest trace of it.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003420_ELIDIBUS<tab>But though sundered and forgotten, through death and mocking rebirth, it has persisted. A whisper of our past, burned into your very aether─along with the sight of our end.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003430_ELIDIBUS<tab>Through the rekindling of memory, I have awoken the ability─just as Hydaelyn is wont to do when She has need of new minions.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003440_URIANGER<tab>The Echo hath ever been thought a gift from Hydaelyn─a boon granted solely to Her chosen. Yet thou wouldst claim She merely awakeneth the power, that men should hearken unto...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003450_URIANGER<tab>Ah.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003460_URIANGER<tab>...Her voice. Given the perceived simultaneity of Her call and the awakening of Her chosen's capacity to hear it, 'tis only natural that we thus attributed the source of the gift. Yet if, in truth, the Echo is a prerequisite for hearing Her voice...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003470_URIANGER<tab>One might surmise that Her call never ceaseth, such that all who awaken to their innate gift might receive of the blessing of Light at the selfsame instant.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003480_URIANGER<tab>In sooth, we bore witness to this but moments ago. At the sight of the starshower, full many in the crowd did speak of hearing a voice in their minds, did they not?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003490_ELIDIBUS<tab>Just so. And whenever Hydaelyn has need of new servants, She is quick to pluck comets from the heavens, or create illusions of the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003500_URIANGER<tab>Why, then, didst thou conjure this vision, full knowing that thine age-old foe would thus claim those awakened to the gift?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003510_ELIDIBUS<tab>“Foe”? You must be mistaken. As you see, I am a Warrior of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003520_ELIDIBUS<tab>And together with my comrades-in-arms, I shall save the world. Just like you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003530_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Crystal Tower's Umbilicus...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Foiled again...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If I cannot imbue the infernal thing with my power via magical means, we may need to devise a way to infuse the vessel with my blood after all...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003570_URIANGER<tab>Art thou unwell?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003580_BEQLUGG<tab>Perhaps a brief respite? It wouldn't do to overtax yourself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I'm fine...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And given to stubbornness, I'm afraid. Especially when I have a stake in the outcome.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003610_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Source...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003620_ZENOS<tab>That dream again...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003630_MYSTERIOUSCOOPERATOR<tab>A recurring dream? They do so fascinate me. Might I trouble you for the details?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003640_ZENOS<tab>I have always dreamed of it... Fire falling from the heavens, and the city─nay, the whole world ablaze.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003650_MYSTERIOUSCOOPERATOR<tab>Indeed... Could Emet-Selch have found a way...? Precious few possess memories of the Final Days.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003660_ZENOS<tab>The Final Days?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003670_MYSTERIOUSCOOPERATOR<tab>Why yes. Admittedly, my knowledge is mostly secondhand, but if you are interested, I will gladly tell you the tale...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003680_MYSTERIOUSCOOPERATOR<tab>The tale of the world's end.
